name: Pixel Island
description:
Pixel Island is a prototype of a relaxing building game about building a village on an island created entirely for fun.

This game has no challenge or objective, it's just a purely relaxing game.

Multiple islands can be created, saved and loaded from the main menu.

Controls:

  • Left click: place object
  • Right click: remove object
  • Middle mouse button + Drag OR arrow keys: move camera
